rev.comment: Does not meet criteria listed on category page (political career not notable separate from acting career)
/* Fan sites */ [[WP:EL]] Links normally to be avoided, #10
/* Fan sites */ Fan sites not allowed in Wikipedia please read rules
/* Fan sites */ trimming excessive fan sites
This is a mature, article use the talk page
fan sites are allowed, the ones listed now are quite notable
Bobdavis4 is right; fansites not allowed under [[WP:EL]]
/* Fan sites */ fan sites not allowed
reinstering protection that was removed by new account.
This does not belong in the intro sentence of a biography. More suitable for stern show article.
Jenna Jameson denied relationship with Howard Stern
/* Personal life */ Joined 2 sentences, eliminating redundant text.
added actor politician category.... the actor is somewhat shakey in my mind but still ... it counts
[[WP:AES|←]]Undid revision 116495419 by [[Special:Contributions/Johnnydale|Johnnydale]] ([[User talk:Johnnydale|talk]]) ---- [[WP:EL]], too many fansites
Segregated personal-life and non-radio-career items from the [[Howard_Stern#Terrestrial_radio_career|Terrestrial radio career]] section.
Rvt. nonsense - HS was endorsed candidate of the the NY Libertarians; endorses Giuliani over Clinton; votes for all parties, beliefs jibe most w. Libertarians; skeptical of ALL organized religion.
Stern is NOT a libertarian, he supports many socialist policies. Staunch Democrat, has endorsed Hillary Clinton.
Bot: Removing Category:Sirius Satellite Radio personalities per [[WP:CFD|CFD]], see [[Wikipedia:Categories for discussion/Log/2007 March 2]]

/* Satellite radio career */ Sirius paid the 2 million.
/* Extraterrestrial radio career */ Extraterrestrial? Sounds like ET (actually IS ET). Changing to traditionally used description
